content.body: I already ordered mine — along with a ordering an extra-long desk, since my current desk is deficiently too short to support proper use of the keyboard. Now I just need to move to desk to a bigger room, since I don’t have enough free space in my current office to fit the improved desk in. But once I do that, I’ll be all set

content.body: annevk: FYI: Stack Overflow question leads to URL-parsing bug getting fixed in the HTML checker, and test suite getting more coverage  https://stackoverflow.com/questions/73845912/why-is-an-invalid-path-when-a-is-valid
